responsibilities: Inbound recruiter focused on Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion efforts for the Rocky Mountain, Texas, and West Coast Offices. Led teams of recruiters to implement DEI efforts for student and experienced professional recruiting. Planned annual conference for Black & Latino/a MBA candidates.

Coordinated annual 1L Diversity Summit for 30-40 diverse students. Implemented diversity recruiting efforts across 20+ law school campuses. Coordinated over 100 virtual and in-person on-campus brand building and diversity events. Planned summer internship program for 20 summer interns across 3 offices. Provided mentorship and onboarding plans for all new hires. *Left briefly from December 2020 to March 2021
Coordinated interviews for 20+ open requisitions for corporate and tech teams.

Wrote 40+ grant applications and raised over $1 Million in grant funds for schools and districts across the state of Colorado. Hosted professional development events at schools around Colorado. Facilitated bullying prevention services to schools in rural Colorado. Facilitated professional development to teachers around social/emotional learning.
